title: The School for Scandal
description: Excerpt from The School for ScandalThe text here printed follows the version adopted by Thomas Moore for the edition Of Sheridan's Dramatic Works published by him in 1821. This has ever since been accepted as a definitive version, yet it does not appear to have been reprinted with complete exactness by other editors who have prepared the comedy for students' reading.
author: Richard Brinsley Sheridan
